CustomField.description: Week Ending date is set to the upcoming Sunday of the current week.(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: DATEVALUE ( CASE( MOD((WorkDate__c)- DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, DATETIMEVALUE(DATE( YEAR(WorkDate__c),MONTH( WorkDate__c),DAY(WorkDate__c)+8)), 1, DATETIMEVALUE(DATE( YEAR(WorkDate__c),MONTH( WorkDate__c),DAY(WorkDate__c)+7)), 2, DATETIMEVALUE(DATE( YEAR(WorkDate__c),MONTH( WorkDate__c),DAY(WorkDate__c)+6)), 3, DATETIMEVALUE(DATE( YEAR(WorkDate__c),MONTH( WorkDate__c),DAY(WorkDate__c)+5)), 4, DATETIMEVALUE(DATE( YEAR(WorkDate__c),MONTH( WorkDate__c),DAY(WorkDate__c)+4)), 5, DATETIMEVALUE(DATE( YEAR(WorkDate__c),MONTH( WorkDate__c),DAY(WorkDate__c)+3)), 6, DATETIMEVALUE(DATE( YEAR(WorkDate__c),MONTH( WorkDate__c),DAY(WorkDate__c)+2)), DATETIMEVALUE(DATE( YEAR(WorkDate__c),MONTH( WorkDate__c),DAY(WorkDate__c))) ))
CustomField.label: WeekEnding Date
